definitions: a plant of temperate regions that typically has leaves similar to those of the willow and pink or pale purple flowers.

notes.text: Epilobium and related genera, family Onagraceae: many species, including the common hairy willow herb (E. hirsutum) and the common fireweed (E. angustifolium)

shortDefinitions: plant of temperate regions that has leaves similar to those of willow
